article.title: Thales To Supply Radar Systems To Indian Air Force
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Thales has been awarded a contract to supply 19 Low Level Transportable Radar (LLTR) systems to the Indian air force. Each LLTR system consists of a Ground Smarter 100 radar, operational and communications shelters, an energy subsystem, a mobility subsystem and personnel living quarters.
